channel.title: World 2 Spawn
channel.description:
MITB can you fix the blocks under where you stand before you login, treeswillown broke them so now when you log in your character bobs up and down and its kind of annoying, despite it being a small annoyance.
Just a small request

item.title: World 2 Spawn
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

They don’t, built-in regular spawn protection is enabled, so no one should be able to do anything, but it looks like it’s broken doesn’t it?

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 Spawn
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

And it would also take a few seconds for someone to block the spawn so you suffocate when you spawn. Why do people have break permissions anyway?

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 Spawn
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:3, topic:419070”][quote author=zuppers link=topic=521599.msg3790750#msg3790750 date=1319262478]
I noticed this too. You should just bedrock the entire area lol.
[/quote]or let people build+break rather than just break… it would take a few seconds for someone to just fill in the hole.[/quote]

Agreed
